long_description: The WTB Bronson Comp 29er mountain bike tire offers sure-handling traction and solid all-around performance at a great value, making it that much easier to get your big-wheeled stoke on. The linked, widely spaced tread design supplies versatile and confident handling on dry hardpack to muddy slop. Ramped center knobs roll fast while the terraced side knobs offer responsive traction throughout your turns. DNA rubber compound is formulated for high-performance riding; robust 27tpi casing. WTB Bronson Comp 29er tire is available in a versatile 2.2 in. width for sure handling on your big-wheelin' adventures.
short_description: The WTB Bronson Comp 29er mountain bike tire offers sure-handling traction and solid all-around performance at a great value, making it that much easier to get your big-wheeled stoke on.
